 35// Evaluate a function object foreach local patch of a distributed view.
 36
 37// Requires:
 38//   VIEW is a distributed view.
 39//   FCN is a function object,
 40//     Arguments:
 41//       PATCH_VIEW - a patch view
 42//       GDOM - the global domain of the patch
 43//     Return value is ignored
 44
 45template <template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
 46	  typename                            T,
 47	  typename                            BlockT,
 48	  typename                            FuncT>
 49void
 50foreach_patch(
 51  ViewT<T, BlockT> view,
 52  FuncT            fcn)
 53{
 54  typedef typename BlockT::map_type         map_t;
 55  typedef typename BlockT::local_block_type local_block_t;
 56
 57  dimension_type const dim = ViewT<T, BlockT>::dim;
 58
 59  BlockT&      block = view.block();
 60  map_t const& map   = view.block().map();
 61
 62  index_type sb = map.subblock();
 63
 64  if (sb != no_subblock)
 65  {
 66    ViewT<T, local_block_t> local_view = get_local_view(view, sb);
 67
 68    for (index_type p=0; p<num_patches(view, sb); ++p)
 69    {
 70      Domain<dim> ldom = local_domain(view, sb, p);
 71      Domain<dim> gdom = global_domain(view, sb, p);
 72
 73      fcn(local_view.get(ldom), gdom);
 74    }
 75  }
 76}
 77
 78
 79
 80// Evaluate a function object foreach local element of a distributed view.
 81
 82// Requires:
 83//   VIEW is a distributed view.
 84//   FCN is a function object that is invoked for each local element,
 85//     Arguments:
 86//       VALUE - the value at the local element (type T),
 87//       L_IDX - the local index of the element in the local subblock,
 88//       G_IDX - the global index of the element in the disrtributed object.
 89//     Return Value 
 90//       FCN should return a value of type T to update the local element.
 91
 92template <typename ViewT,
 93	  typename FuncT>
 94void
 95foreach_point(
 96  ViewT view,
 97  FuncT fcn)
 98{
 99  dimension_type const dim = ViewT::dim;
100  typedef typename ViewT::block_type::map_type map_t;
101
102  map_t const& map = view.block().map();
103
104  index_type sb = map.subblock();
105  if (sb != no_subblock)
106  {
107    typename ViewT::local_type local_view = get_local_view(view);
108
109    for (index_type p=0; p<num_patches(view, sb); ++p)
110    {
111      Domain<dim> ldom = local_domain(view, sb, p);
112      Domain<dim> gdom = global_domain(view, sb, p);
113
114      Length<dim> ext = extent(ldom);
115      for (Index<dim> idx; valid(ext,idx); next(ext, idx))
116      {
117	Index<dim> l_idx = domain_nth(ldom, idx);
118	Index<dim> g_idx = domain_nth(gdom, idx);
119
120	put(local_view, l_idx, fcn(get(local_view, l_idx), l_idx, g_idx));
121      }
122    }
123  }
124}
125
126
127
128template <typename T, typename Block>
129void
130buf_send(
131  Communicator&          comm,
132  processor_type         dest_proc,
133  const_Vector<T, Block> data)
134{
135  T* raw = new T[data.size()];
136
137  for (index_type i=0; i<data.size(); ++i)
138    raw[i] = data.get(i);
139
140  comm.buf_send(dest_proc, raw, data.size());
141
142  delete[] raw;
143}
144
145
146
147template <typename T,
148	  typename Block>
149inline void
150buf_send(
151  Communicator&          comm,
152  processor_type         dest_proc,
153  const_Matrix<T, Block> data)
154{
155  T* raw = new T[data.size()];
156
157  for (index_type r=0; r<data.size(0); ++r)
158    for (index_type c=0; c<data.size(1); ++c)
159      raw[r*data.size(1)+c] = data.get(r, c);
160
161  comm.buf_send(dest_proc, raw, data.size());
162
163  delete[] raw;
164}
165
166
167
168template <typename T,
169	  typename Block>
170void
171recv(
172  Communicator&    comm,
173  processor_type   src_proc,
174  Vector<T, Block> data)
175{
176  T* raw = new T[data.size()];
177
178  comm.recv(src_proc, raw, data.size());
179
180  for (index_type i=0; i<data.size(); ++i)
181    data.put(i, raw[i]);
182
183  delete[] raw;
184}
185
186
187
188template <typename T,
189	  typename Block>
190void
191recv(
192  Communicator&    comm,
193  processor_type   src_proc,
194  Matrix<T, Block> data)
195{
196  T* raw = new T[data.size()];
197
198  comm.recv(src_proc, raw, data.size());
199
200  for (index_type r=0; r<data.size(0); ++r)
201    for (index_type c=0; c<data.size(1); ++c)
202      data.put(r, c, raw[r*data.size(1)+c]);
203
204  delete[] raw;
205}
